quests.name: Miracles Take Time
objectives:
What was that strange noise?!
  ‧ Investigate the mysterious Pumpkin House in the Forgotten Lands.

Talk to the Fairy Godmother
  ‧ Gather Purified Night Shard (5) for the Fairy Godmother's enchantment.
Bring the Fairy Godmother the Purified Night Shards.
Follow the Fairy Godmother to the Dreamscape's entrance.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother.
Enter the Dreamscape through the Tree House in the Forgotten Lands.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother in the Dreamscape

Collect the Forgotten's Memories from the pedestals:
  ‧ Memory of Power
  ‧ Memory of Courage
  ‧ Memory of Love
Talk to the Fairy Godmother in the Dreamscape.

quests.name: Forgotten Memories: Friendship
objectives: Talk to the Fairy Godmother at the gateway.
Step through the first gate in the Dreamscape to uncover the Forgotten's lost Memory.

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape.
  ‧ See what Mickey wants THIS time...

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Pick some Ugly Flower (5) to make some kinda bouquet? Ugh. Whatever.

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Craft a Hideous Bouquet at the Crafting Station near Goofy's House. (What's the point in making a nice bouquet anyway...?)

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape
  ‧ Make sure you have the Hideous Bouquet in your Inventory.
  ‧ Find Minnie by the Pillar and give her the Hideous Bouquet. (Because you have to do EVERYTHING around here...)

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Return to Mickey.

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Now Goofy wants something? Sigh. Better speak to him too...

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the dreamscape by finding:
  ‧ Rotten Carrot (1)
  ‧ Rotten Tomato (1)
  ‧ Rotten Clam (2)

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Nasty Bouillabaisse.

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Make sure you have the Nasty Bouillabaisse in your Inventory.
  ‧ Bring the Nasty Bouillabaisse to Goofy.

Uncover the Forgotten's first lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Minnie wants to talk to you... again.
Collect the Memory of Friendship from the pedestal.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother about what you learned.

quests.name: Forgotten Memories: Trust
objectives: Talk to the Fairy Godmother at the next gateway.
Step through the second gate in the Dreamscape to uncover the Forgotten's lost Memory.

Uncover the Forgotten's Second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Mother Gothel wants something. Guess you should talk to her...

Uncover the Forgotten's second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Follow Mother Gothel to the Pillar of Trust. This better be important...

Uncover the Forgotten's second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Talk to Mother Gothel.

Uncover the Forgotten's second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Rip that ugly Orb right out of that annoying Pillar of Trust.

Uncover the Forgotten's second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Show the Orb to Mother Gothel.

Uncover the Forgotten's second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Fish the Jewel-Encrusted Mirror? out of the water in the Glade of Trust.

Uncover the Forgotten's second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ This mirror is nothing but junk! Return to Mother Gothel near the Giant Willow and give her a piece of your mind...
  ‧ Uncover the Forgotten's second lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
Confront Mother Gothel.
Collect the Memory of Trust from the pedestal.
Speak to the Fairy Godmother about what you've learned.

quests.name: Forgotten Memories: Nurturing
objectives: Talk to the Fairy Godmother at the last gateway.
Step through the third gate in the Dreamscape to uncover the Forgotten's final Memory.

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ What does Scar want...? Better talk to him.

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Crush the flowers around the Plateau to weaken the Pillar's energy. (8)

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Return to Scar.

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape by planting and tending to the Night Thorn Seeds: (Even More Miraculous Growth Elixir is recommended)
  ‧ Near the giant Dreamlight Tree. (5)
  ‧ Near the Pillar of Nurturing. (5)
  ‧ Near the Mine entrance and the waterfall. (5)

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Recover the Orb of Nurturing near the Pillar.

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Return to Scar near his cave.

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Talk to Scar.

Uncover the Forgotten's final lost Memory in the Dreamscape:
  ‧ Confront Merlin. It looks like he has some more "advice" for you...
Return to the Fairy Godmother in the Dreamscape.
Pick up the Forgotten's final Memory in the Dreamscape.
Talk to the Fairy Godmother about what you learned.

quests.name: What's Left Behind
objectives: Grab the Orb of Remembrance.
Talk to the Forgotten.
Leave the Dreamscape.
Tell the Fairy Godmother what's happened.
